Expected Result: The Welcome Back screen is shown.

The Ether balance is shown on the overview.
The wallet address is shown on the overview.
The selected network is Ethereum Mainnet.

Test Steps: Switch networks to a test network.
Expected Result:
The Sepolia balance is shown on the overview.
The wallet address is shown on the overview.
The selected network is Sepolia.

Test Steps: Open the test dapp in another tab.

Expected Result: Request encryption public key notification screen is shown.

Test Steps: Proceed to confirm get encryption key in notification window.
Expected Result: The encryption key is displayed on testdapp page.

Test Steps: On testdapp, in encrypt/decrypt section, enter a message in input field and click "Encrypt".
Expected Result: The encrypted message is displayed in ciphertext format.
Notes: Make a copy of the encrypted message.

Test Steps: On testdapp, paste the copied message in previous step in the input field, then click "Decrypt".
Expected Result: Decrypt request notification screen is shown.

Test Steps: Proceed to confirm decrypt message in notification.
Expected Result: The decrypted message is displayed, and the value is the same as the previously entered one.
